survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Online Grocery Delivery Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on their experience with online grocery delivery services, including satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online grocery delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for easy selection. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How often do you use online grocery delivery services?

questions.question_text: Which online grocery delivery services have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which online grocery delivery services have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an online grocery delivery service? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format with a limit of 3 selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with selection limit and optional open-text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an online grocery delivery service? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using online grocery delivery services?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using online grocery delivery services?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for online grocery delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for lengthy responses.
